title: Hibernate Auto update entity without change when using JSON mapping

labels.name: triage/upstream
labels.description: Used for issues which are caused by issues in upstream projects/dependency

body:
### Describe the bug

i have entity like flow code
```java
@Getter
@Setter
@Entity
@Table(name = "role")
public class RoleEntity  {
    @Id
    @UuidGenerator(style = TIME)
    private String id;
    private String name;
    //!!!!!!this is point!!!!!!!!
    //!!!!!!this is point!!!!!!!!
    //!!!!!!this is point!!!!!!!!
    private List<String> permissions; 
}


@Getter
@Setter
@Entity
@Table(name = "employee_role")
public class EmployeeRoleEntity  {
    @Id
    @UuidGenerator(style = TIME)
    private String id;
    @ManyToOne(fetch = FetchType.LAZY, optional = false)
    private RoleEntity role;
    @ManyToOne(fetch = FetchType.LAZY, optional = false)
    private EmployeeEntity employee;
}

@Getter
@Setter
@Entity
@Table(name = "employee")
public class EmployeeEntity {
    @Id
    @UuidGenerator(style = TIME)
    private String id;
    private String name;
}

```

i have readonly query to find employe permissons.
it work well on quarkus 3.6.4, but not work on quarkus 3.6.5
i got error message:
```log
2024-01-28 00:55:14,713 ERROR [io.sma.gra.exe.err.ExceptionHandler] (vert.x-eventloop-thread-2) [,] SRGQL012000: Data Fetching Error: org.hibernate.exception.LockAcquisitionException: could not execute batch [Batch entry 0 update role set attributes='{}',created_at='2024-01-25 05:39:00.673998+00',created_by=NULL,description=NULL,name='所有功能',org_id=NULL,permissions=?,status='ENABLED',type='CUSTOM',updated_at='2024-01-27 16:55:14.481232+00',updated_by='all' where id='1' was aborted: ERROR: could not serialize access due to concurrent update  Call getNextException to see other errors in the batch.] [update role set attributes=?,created_at=?,created_by=?,description=?,name=?,org_id=?,permissions=?,status=?,type=?,updated_at=?,updated_by=? where id=?]

```

i found some patterns, i think this is hibernate 6.2.14.Final issue
- use permission field,  quarkus 3.6.4, work well
- use permission field,  quarkus 3.6.5, not work
- remove permission field,  quarkus 3.6.5, work well
- use permission field,  quarkus 3.6.4, hibernate 6.2.13.Final, work well
- use permission field,  quarkus 3.6.4, hibernate 6.2.14.Final, not work
- remove permission field,  quarkus 3.6.4, hibernate 6.2.14.Final, work well

_No response_

### Actual behavior

_No response_

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

Oracle GraalVM 21.0.1+12.1

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.6.5~3.6.7

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

8.5

_No response_
